articles.author: Joe Bray
articles.title: Pep Guardiola names Man City's most difficult game of Premier League title race run-in - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester City have five games left in the Premier League, knowing they will win the title with maximum points.
articles.content:
Manchester City's win over West Ham was proof that no game will be easy in their quest to win another Premier League title.
City beat Arsenal and Fulham in the last week to take control of the title… [+2172 chars]
